p: Temperature and rainfall data in the Siziwang Banner from 1981 to 2010 were obtained from the website of China Mereorological Administration, China Meteorological Data Service Center ( http://www.cma.gov.cn). The study area has a typical temperate continental climate. Mean annual temperature is 3.4°C, and mean monthly temperature for April, May, June, and July is 6, 13, 18, and 21°C, respectively. Mean annual precipitation is 280 mm, with >73% of it occurring from June to September.
